trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_AudioLevelUpdated" name="AudioLevelUpdated" href=""></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> class.

When they are raised, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> events pass an instance of AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs to the handler for the associated event.

The <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.AudioLevelUpdatedEventArgs.AudioLevel%2A> property gets the new level of audio input when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised.

The `AudioLevel` property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> and <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> classes provides the current level of the audio input to the speech recognition engine.

Gets the new level of audio input after the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.AudioLevelUpdated"></xref> or the <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.AudioLevelUpdated"></xref> event is raised.
The new level of audio input.
